thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service Great Room Small
thread.title_full: Service Great Room Small - Review of Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: lisaarmy
title: Service Great Room Small
text: As a Marriott Silver guest I would have hoped for an upgrade. The room I received was small with a queen bed looking at an office building. All the folks I spoke with at the hotel were very nice. The cleaning staff was very loud in the hallway during the mid afternoon when I came back to do some work. The area is very nice to stay in an very convenient to downtown Paris.
